recipe.title: Mexican Chopped Salad with Honey-Lime Dressing
ingredients: 1 can (15.5 oz) black beans, rinsed and well drained
3/4 cup fresh corn kernels, uncooked (or frozen or canned)
1 tsp chopped jalapeño pepper (use canned for less heat)
instructions: Toss all salad ingredients in a large bowl. In separate bowl, mix dressing ingredients. Pour dressing over mixture and toss again. Season with salt and pepper to taste.
